mapper.sql: id, org, per_name, per_tel, per_addr, addr, code, cont_name, cont_tel, status, start, end, pick
mapper.select: SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE addr = #{addr} AND code = #{code} AND status = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM t_pack WHERE per_tel = #{phone} AND status = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM t_pack WHERE per_tel = #{phone} AND status = 1 OR status = -1

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
AND addr IN (
'${addr}'
)
ORDER BY start DESC

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE status = 0 AND per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
ORDER BY end DESC

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE (status = 1 OR status = -1) AND per_tel IN ( SELECT phone FROM t_user WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
ORDER BY code
SELECT count(*) FROM t_pack WHERE addr = #{addr} AND status = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM t_pack WHERE addr = #{addr} AND status = 1 OR status = -1

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
ORDER BY start DESC

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE status = 0 AND addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
ORDER BY end DESC

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE (status = 1 OR status = -1) AND addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} )
AND org IN (
'${org}'
)
ORDER BY code

SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, per_addr, addr , code, cont_name, cont_tel , status, start, end, pick FROM t_pack WHERE addr = #{addr} AND status = -1 AND start IN ( SELECT MIN(start) FROM t_pack WHERE addr = #{addr} AND status = -1 )
SELECT id, org, per_name , per_tel, code, start FROM t_pack WHERE addr IN ( SELECT addr FROM t_admin WHERE card = #{card} ) AND status = 1 AND code LIKE CONCAT(#{shelf}, '%') ORDER BY code
